root.name: Battle Territory: Battery
root.description: Changing mag! Battle Territory: Battery is a free-to-play first person shooter by Webzen Korea. Battle Territory shows similar elements to the highly popular first person shooter Modern Warfare 2. These similarities range from the similar weapons, attachments and HUD elements to Kill Streaks Rewards. As of the trailer, the game seems to be graphic as you can see limbs getting shot off.
